node.title: Regan has barely seen her fiance for two years. They'll finally be reunited when WA's border reopens
node.alt: A head and shoulders shot of a young smiling couple posing for a photo outdoors.
node.description: Regan has hardly seen her fiance since taking a job in Melbourne at the start of the pandemic. Now they will finally be reunited when WA's hard border falls on February 5.
node.content:
["Reactions to the WA government's border reopening announcement range from trepidation to elation.", "But for those separated from loved ones, like Regan Bembridge, February 5 could not come soon enough.\u00a0", "On Monday WA Premier Mark McGowan announced the state would reopen its borders, almost two years after COVID-19 cut WA off from the rest of the world.", "Ms Bembridge took a job in Melbourne at the start of the pandemic and has\u00a0been largely separated from her fiance Shaun Rodan ever since.", "\"I've been separated from my fiance for two years,\" she said.\u00a0", "\"I took a job over here [in Melbourne] and then obviously was straight into lockdown and not able to get back.\u00a0", "", "
Lockdowns and WA's strict border rules have kept the couple apart.\u00a0(ABC News: supplied)
", "The pair have managed to visit each other a couple of times over the two years.\u00a0", "\"It's a bit surreal that I can finally book a ticket without having to worry about two weeks quarantine or getting stuck or not being able to get back and missing work,\" Ms Bembridge said.", "\"Someone told me earlier that everything was opening up and I literally booked a ticket for the 5th of February.\u00a0", "\"So as soon as I could, I did, and I've got my ticket and I can't wait.\"", "", "
The reopening date has given\u00a0Regan the peace of mind to book a ticket to see Sean.(Supplied)
", "
International artists coming soon to Perth
", "The news was also welcomed by\u00a0The Rechabite general manager Anneika Britten, who\u00a0is looking forward to the Perth venue being able to host interstate and international artists.", "Western Australia will finally allow quarantine-free travel,\u00a0 but there will still be strict testing requirements for anyone travelling into the state.", "International arrivals who have been fully vaccinated will need proof of a negative COVID-19 test taken within 72 hours prior to their departure.\u00a0", "They will need to be tested again after 48 hours and on their sixth day in WA.", "The requirements are similar for domestic travellers, but they won't have to take a test on the sixth day.", "\"Really thrilled to hear we won't be operating at half capacity or anything like that, so we'll be able to bring acts from interstate and maybe even overseas and have that tourism business as well and be able to have the venue full and bustling again, it'll be great,\" Ms Britten\u00a0said.", "\"Obviously safety is the utmost concern for everyone, but operating at half capacity when we had to was a bit of a struggle.\u00a0", "\"A\u00a0large building like this has pretty set amounts of people that are required to run it, so we really need to be busy to keep the business thriving and being able to operate at full capacity for these previous few months has been great.\"", "", "
Anneika Britten is grateful the venue will be able to operate without capacity restrictions.\u00a0(ABC News: Keane Bourke)
", "Ms Britten said she was confident her business would be able to adapt to the state government's new app, which would also show people's vaccination status.", "\"Everyone that works in the industry is now pretty great at rolling with the punches,\" she said.", "\"So far the things we've had to contend\u00a0with haven't been too difficult, so it's just about adapting really.\"", "
Tourism operators ready to roll out welcome mat
", "Broome tourism operator Candy Roberts said she lost about\u00a070 per cent of her customers when the border closed in March, and West Australians had kept her business afloat.\u00a0", "", "
Candy\u00a0Roberts is excited that she will soon be able to open her business to interstate and overseas travellers.(ABC Pilbara: Hannah Barry)
", "\"Parts were so challenging;\u00a0[constantly] changing everything, cancellations and re-booking,\" she said.", "\"They have been coming and coming and coming, and it's just been tremendous.\"", "", "
Cable Beach in Broome was a popular spot for tourists from around the world before the border slammed shut.(ABC Kimberley: Sam Tomlin)
", "If vaccination rates stay below 80 per cent in the Kimberley, Pilbara and Goldfields, proof of vaccination and mask requirements will be made mandatory, and unvaccinated people will be unable to fly to the regions.", "While Ms Roberts accepted this would have some impact on visitor numbers, she said it was for the best.", "\"I feel really excited, [but] now that we're going to open, we're going to have to be more diligent and be more mindful of what the news is, what's happening, and protect ourselves,\" she said.", "\"We need to own that and be responsible, and I'm really excited that we can open our borders to other states and get them coming again.\"", "
Mixed reactions from shoppers
", "The reactions from shoppers in Perth's CBD were mostly positive, with many excited to make holiday plans, see family or just get on a plane.", "\"I have my family back in Malaysia and it's been two years since I last saw them,\" said one young woman.", "\"It would mean a lot for me to be able to go back and spend quality time with them.\"", "An older shopper said her excitement for seeing overseas family members was tinged with concern about the virus entering WA.", "\"I'm also slightly worried about COVID coming into WA because we've been quite safe until now but we have to get on and live with it.", "\"Please just get vaccinated, not just for yourself but for everyone else.\"\u00a0", "
Return of face-to-face business deals welcomed
", "Passers by in suits were looking forward to doing business in person, rather than over a computer.", "\"I think it's a good thing [because]\u00a0it's important for businesses to be able to connect better,\" one man said.", "\"There will be times when it's important to do things in person so that will be a bit easier with the borders opening.", "\"At some point, people need to be able to move freely.\u00a0", "\"We've had a couple of years and I think it's probably time for things to get back to normal.\""]
